fuzzydl.milp

Class Expression

  • java.lang.Object
    • fuzzydl.milp.Expression

  • public class Expression
extends java.lang.Object
    Linear expression of the form c + c1 * x1 + c2 * x2 + ... + cN * xN
    Author:
    Fernando Bobillo
